MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the SY10 postcode area of Oswestry is still ongoing. This is due to further work required and we now expect power to be back on by 5.30PM.  We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.30PM on 14th October 2020.
